Fri, 31 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Some of the unauthorised works at the centre of a recent Environment Court case. Graeme Bowkett was ordered to remove these gabion baskets along with a 52-metre long concrete-base beneath them, and a boat ramp, he'd illegally installed in front of his home in a secluded cove near Langs Beach.
